properties.name: elf4j.metrics.logging.exceptions
properties.description: If true, exception message will be logged.

properties.name: elf4j.metrics.logging.ttl
properties.description: Time To Live for the saved log (in seconds). By default, user logs are kept for 1 week = 604800 seconds.

properties.name: elf4j.metrics.adminRole
properties.description: The name of the security role for individuals allowed access to the logs.

properties.name: elf4j.metrics.adminPageName
properties.description: The name of the page to be displayed as admin page. This will also be the name of the route or endpoint.

properties.name: elf4j.metrics.logging.extra.enabled
properties.description: If true, exception message will be logged.

properties.name: elf4j.metrics.logging.extra.ttl
properties.description: By default ttl for system logs is 1 day = 86400 seconds.
